title: Just Cause 4: Day One Edition + 5 DLCs
body:
Just Cause 4: Day One Edition + 5 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Driving, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Avalanche Studios, Square Enix
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 53.9 GB
Repack Size: from 15.2 GB [Selective Download]

Repack was updated on December 11. No new content is included, but the minimum size is smaller by 1.2 GB, installation is faster by a factor of 2-2.5 (depends on your PC) and less HDD space required during installation.

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Just.Cause.4-CPY ISO release: cpy-jc4.iso (57,831,747,584 bytes)
  • 2 missing DLCs added: Renegade Pack and Neon Racer Pack, thanks to whiteee!
  • 5 released DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with all optionals)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading of voicepacks you don’t need, unused videos and High Resolution Textures Pack (Very High options in game settings – don’t turn it on if you don’t have HRTP installed)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 53.9 to 15.2~25.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~25 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~45 minutes on 4-threads CPU for any single language and without HRTP
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 54 GB (55 GB during installation)
  • Audio language can be changed in game settings
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the GUI language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7
  • Repack uses compression library by Razor12911

Game Description

Welcome to Solis, a huge South American world home of conflict, oppression and extreme weather conditions. Just Cause 4 sees rogue agent Rico Rodriguez land in Solis to hunt down the truth about his past, at any cost. Strap into your wingsuit, equip your fully customizable grappling hook, and get ready to bring the thunder!

Bring The Thunder: Soar through the skies with your wingsuit – Skydive, Base Jump and Free Dive with no limits!

Fight your enemies under extreme weather conditions, including towering tornadoes and tropical lightning storms, taking the iconic Just Cause action to insane new heights.

Use extreme weather events to your advantage thanks to never seen before in-game physics.

Included DLCs

  • Deathstalker Scorpion Pack
  • Digital Deluxe Content
  • Renegade Pack
  • Neon Racer Pack
  • Golden Gear Pack

3 more DLCs to be released for this game in 2019: Dare Devils, Demons and Danger. That’s why this edition can’t be called Gold yet.

You can skip downloading of these files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-highres-textures.bin (Very High options in game settings – don’t turn it on if you don’t have HRTP installed)
  • fg-optional-useless-videos.bin (Credits for JC3 (yes, 3!) and other videos which aren’t used by the game anymore)
  • fg-selective-english.bin + fg-selective-english-2.bin (recommended for all languages without their own voiceovers)
  • fg-selective-arabic.bin + fg-selective-arabic-2.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin + fg-selective-brazilian-2.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin + fg-selective-french-2.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin + fg-selective-german-2.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin + fg-selective-italian-2.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin + fg-selective-mexican-2.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin + fg-selective-russian-2.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin + fg-selective-spanish-2.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin, fg-selective-german-2.bin & all main files (01-09).
